timeline.bodyText:
Some line breaks would be nice.
This applies to multiple changes made in this PR, do we have a convention about how many characters per line are acceptable?
timeline.author: kBlaszczyk

replies.bodyText: That's a little wide, yeah. The project standard (defined in Checkstyle config) is 175, which is pretty wide, so apply best judgement even if approaching that. This exceeds it by a bit.
replies.author: Cervator
